definition: Songhua River in Jilin province 吉林省 through Harbin 哈尔滨, a tributary of Heilongjiang 黑龍江|黑龙江
pine/CL:棵[ke1]
surname Song
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Jiang

sentences.english: Zhaoyuan section is the frontage of monitoring water quality of Songhua River main stream.
sentences.chinese: 松花江肇源江段是松花江幹流水質監測的前哨。

sentences.english: Zhaoyuan section is the frontage of monitoring water quality of Songhua River main stream.
sentences.chinese: 松花江肇源江段是松花江幹流水質監測的前哨。

sentences.english: He studied the shaping of the ice dam of the lower reaches of Song Hua River.
sentences.chinese: 他對松花江下游冰壩的形成進行了研究。

sentences.english: Until 1896, Harbin was a fishing village on the banks of the Songhua River.
sentences.chinese: 直到1896年，哈爾濱只是一個松花江畔的漁村。

sentences.english: Workers began hauling chunks of ice out of the Songhua River on Dec. 6.
sentences.chinese: 工人們自12月6號就開始從松花江裏搬運冰塊。

sentences.english: Nearly all chemical barrels recovered from river .
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有流入松花江溫德河均被收回。

sentences.english: Jilin city was named after Jilin River-namely Songhua River today.
sentences.chinese: 吉林城得名于吉林江，即今松花江。

sentences.english: This paper presents the status quo of water pollution in Songhua River and pollution control countermeasures at present.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了松花江水污染現狀，提出了水污染的控制對策。

sentences.english: My family in the Northeast Songhua River, there has all over the soybean sorghum.
sentences.chinese: 我的家在東北松花江上啊，那裏有滿山遍野大豆高粱。

sentences.english: The method is efficient for application in the jilin section of songhua river.
sentences.chinese: 該方法在松花江吉林江段上應用是成功的。

sentences.english: Daqing-Harbin Pipeline passing Songhua River project has applied horizontal oriental drilling technology.
sentences.chinese: 慶哈輸油管道工程穿越松花江應用了水平定向鑽技術。

sentences.english: The Songhua River runs from west to east through the city.
sentences.chinese: 松花江從西向東橫貫全市。
